solution_line_template: 75% of one pan is {pieces_per_pan} x {second_pan_percent_eaten} = <<{pieces_per_pan}*{second_pan_percent_eaten}={pieces_eaten_second_pan}>>{pieces_eaten_second_pan} pieces.
This many guests eat the brownies ala mode {total_pieces_eaten} - {guests_not_ala_mode} = <<{total_pieces_eaten}-{guests_not_ala_mode}={guests_ala_mode}>>{guests_ala_mode}.
This many scoops are eaten by the guests {guests_ala_mode} x {scoops_per_guest} = <<{guests_ala_mode}*{scoops_per_guest}={total_scoops_eaten}>>{total_scoops_eaten}.
The guests eat this many tubs {total_scoops_eaten} / {scoops_per_tub} = <<{total_scoops_eaten}/{scoops_per_tub}={total_tubs_eaten}>>{total_tubs_eaten} tubs.
